page.title: 05The Eglwysbach Show
page.content: The biggest event in Eglwysbach is the Eglwysbach Show which is always held on the second Saturday in August. The success of the Show all depends on the weather. This year it was warm. They started putting up the poles on the Monday before the Show. There are many visitors from the big towns like Birmingham and Manchester who come here. There are lots of sections, for example, the Children's section, flower section and cakes section. There are lots of animals, sheep and cows shut up in pens as well as ponies, horses and shire horses. This year, in the main ring, there was a fancy dress competion with children on their ponies, including one dressed up as a postbox and another as a knight. There was also a fire show, tractor driving competion, riding and gymkhana, and a fun fair.
